value.name: SC Police Fatally Shot Armed Suspect Who Killed Cyclist Minutes Before
value.description: Minutes after a beloved Greenville, South Carolina cyclist was shot and killed on Mother’s Day, police fatally shot the armed suspect believed to be the killer, according to the Greenville Police Department.
